casebody.data:
Terrance STEVENSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2016.

Stephen A. Lebedevitch, in support of the petition.

Leon F. Dalbec, Jr., senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Terrance Stevenson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 355, 139 A.3d 718 (2016), is denied.
